task.title: Configure Java
task.shortdesc: Java services include the CLC, UFS, OSG, Walrus, and SC.

context.p: For the supported version of the Java Virtual Machine (JVM), .
RPM packages require java-1.8.0-openjdk so will be installed automatically.

step.cmd: Verify that the CLOUD_OPTS setting does not set --java-home, or that --java-home points to a supported JVM version.

info.note: Although it is possible to set --java-home, we do not recommend it unless there is a specific reason to do so.

step.cmd: If you are upgrading to 4.3, note that Java 8 does not have permanent generation memory. Remove any JAVA_OPTS MaxPermSize settings at upgrade time.
Repeat on each host machine that will run a service.
